thread.title: Lamar Odom 'b reathing on his own'
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom 'b reathing on his own'

title: Lamar Odom 'b reathing on his own'
text:
Share Updated: 10/18 12:49 pm 
Lamar Odom has been taken off a ventilator and is now breathing on his own, according to reports. 
The former basketball player was hospitalized on Tuesday after being found unconscious at the Love Ranch South brothel in Pahrump, Nevada. 
He had suffered a series of strokes and organ failure and was placed on a ventilator to assist with his breathing at Sunrise Hospital in Las Vegas. 
It was reported Odom had taken cocaine and a sex drug, along with a substantial amount of alcohol. Brothel workers found the former Los Angeles Lakers player and immediately called an ambulance. 
Editors at TMZ.com report that on Saturday his condition significantly improved, and he is now breathing on his own, but sources told the website he is still using an oxygen mask, and several of his organs are not responding to treatment. 
Odom has been communicating physically and verbally with doctors, after reports on Friday that he awoke from his coma to tell estranged wife Khloe Kardashian that he loved her. The pair split in 2013, and Khloe Kardashian filed for divorce after reports of Odom's infidelity and drug use. A judge has yet to sign off on their divorce, leaving them still legally married. 
Kim Kardashian posted a photo of her dancing with her brother-in-law on Instagram.com on Saturday, writing, "I have faith in you. I believe in the power of prayer and positive energy! Thank you all for your prayers! Lammy - I'm so happy Kendall & I could make you smile today! God is good!" 
Kardashian matriarch Kris Jenner also thanked fans for keeping the sports star in their thoughts, and shared a photo on Instagram of her with son Rob and son-in-law Odom. "Come on Lamar!!!!" she wrote. "You are such a champion... I know you got this.... #ourfighter #pleasepray #love #thatsmileiseverything." Copyright WENN.com
